title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solving the Observability Mystery with AWS Step Functions (API321)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Step Functions 解决可观测性难题 (API321)
abstract: This session explores advanced observability techniques for AWS Step Functions. You'll learn effective patterns combining metrics, tracing, and composite alarms to gain comprehensive insights into your workflow executions. Drawing from real-world enterprise experiences, we'll share practical approaches that have proven effective in maintaining reliability at scale.
abstract_cn: 本课程探讨 AWS Step Functions 的高级可观测性技术。您将学习结合指标、追踪和复合告警的有效模式，以全面洞察工作流执行情况。我们将借鉴真实的企业实践经验，分享在大规模环境中维护可靠性的实用方法。
